name: Radiation Nation
description:
This is a game created by a group of people for a university game jam project. We were given an image to base our game off of and this is the result!

The aim of the game is to score as high as possible, gaining points by mowing grass, and collecting batteries. Picking up batteries gives power and a speed boost, fill up your power bar and go into power mode, going faster and getting double points! While playing, watch out for hazardous boxes and the rat that chases you. If you get hit, you'll lose power. Run out of power and you lose the game.

Credits:

  • Katie Wright – Producer/Concept Artist/3D Artist 
  • Harry Miller – Programmer 
  • Alexandru Afloarei-Ionut – Programmer
  • Andrian Denys – Lead artist (also made background for this PowerPoint)
  • Fin Miller – Texturing/3D artist/UI artist
  • John Bates – Texturing/3D Artist
  • Nathan Whitehead – Texturing/3D Artist
  • Ludovic Jean-Francois – Foley Sound Artist
  • Colin Cupid – Musician
  • Jamie Bovell – UI artist/Logo designer 

The developer high score is 574, let us know if you can beat it :)
